<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    COFFBigObjHeader =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header">object::coff&#95;bigobj&#95;file&#95;header</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.data() +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                                  CurPtr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verify that we are dealing with bigobj.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (COFFBigObjHeader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header/#a2f8e42c1b21e9abb27b8c942ff0e1b65">Version</a> &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coff/bigobjheader/#ad65c26a9ca959e73682acb723a9a963da35098a5e6c71482140d6a477ec7f56ea">COFF::BigObjHeader::MinBigObjectVersion</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::memcmp(COFFBigObjHeader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header/#ac2267ccdeeee2d351106b7b02db1959a">UUID</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae89cd5cd0f88610c3b724d104f6f0fd8">COFF::BigObjMagic</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae89cd5cd0f88610c3b724d104f6f0fd8">COFF::BigObjMagic</a>)) == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">      COFFHeader = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurPtr += </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header">object::coff&#95;bigobj&#95;file&#95;header</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">      COFFBigObjHeader = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint16&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#a2e16e55de32fe349f3e8242166918205">Machine</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      COFFHeader ? COFFHeader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-file-header/#a1d84f6f2d8cef9f89861ad93792d1be1">Machine</a> : COFFBigObjHeader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/object/coff-bigobj-file-header/#abd23558a463c34ebfaa6cbec428f81ea">Machine</a>;</span></CodeLine>
